description: Memory tool: store, recall, and delete memories across scopes

steps.userQuery: remember that we use Spring Boot 3.3.1 for this project
steps.description: Generalist stores a memory using the memory tool

agentResponses.responseFallback:
I'll store that information for you.

<tool_call>
{"name": "memory", "args": {"operation": "store", "scope": "SESSION", "key": "framework-version", "content": "This project uses Spring Boot 3.3.1 with Java 21", "tags": ["framework", "spring", "java"]}}
</tool_call>

steps.userQuery: what framework version do we use?

agentResponses.responseFallback:

<tool_call>
{"name": "memory", "args": {"operation": "recall", "scope": "SESSION", "query": "framework"}}
</tool_call>
